remark.ch: 第一次上課請務必到S1-503教室進行分組

goal.en: This course focuses on cultivating students‘ ability to read, understand and analyze scientific literature and also training students to give academic presentations.
goal.ch: 培養同學對科學文獻閱讀、解析之能力，以及訓練同學進行學術演講及報告。

content.ch: 科學文獻閱讀、解析學術演講演練

grading.en: Presentation 50％ Question answering 20％ Attendance 15％ Question asking 15％
grading.ch: 演講 50％ 問題回答 20％ 出席 15％ 提問 15％

en.competency: To equip oneself with professional knowledge
en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Attendance/Performance ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

en.competency: To posses e-learning and computer skills
To be able to identify and solve problems
To continue to improve one‘s language skills
To develop the qualities of coordination and leadership

ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 自我評量/同儕互評

ch.competency: 具備數位學習與應用的能力
具備發掘問題與思考的能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現
口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 養成協調與領導的能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 其他

en: Department:Department of Chemistry only.Year:Fourth Year only.
ch: 系所:限化學學系。年級:限四年級。
系所:限雙主修-化學學系。
